item.title: Server HELP!

item.description:
@r_s_ownz wrote:

I did what a tut told me and set the Variables and i have the newest jdk which is 6 version 7 .and i did everything and set my variables and i downloaded a server and clicked Runserver and then i went on silabsoft and it still says Error connecting to server.i went on no-ip and made my server and i dont have a router so i dont need to Port forward.But when i cliked runserver the little black box said Java not recogonized as a batch fileâ€¦ and i tried everything.

My Variables On the top box is. Classpath=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_06\bin;%CLASSPATH%;

On the bottom box its Path=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_06\bin;

Please help me!
